Images & Videos of Minecraft Trial on PC

Download Play Minecraft Trial on PC with MEmu Android Emulator. Have fun playing on big screen. Minecraft is an open word game where you decide where your adventure will take you.

game info

Minecraft is an open word game where you decide where your adventure will take you. Explore infinitely large worlds* and build everything yourself, from a simple house to an imposing castle. In this free, limited-time demo version, you can try Minecraft in survival mode, in which you must craft weapons and armor to defend yourself against attacks from dangerous creatures. Create, explore and survive!

To fully experience Minecraft – including creative mode, multiplayer and more – you can purchase the game at any point during or after trying the demo version.
SUPPORT: https://www.minecraft.net/help
LEARN MORE: https://www.minecraft.net/

*Worlds played in the demo version do not carry over to the full version of the game.
